alert.note: Alert for Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 11:19PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Tarrant County through 1145 PM CDT... At 1119 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Watauga, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Worth, Arlington, Grand Prairie, Euless, Bedford, Grapevine, Haltom City, Keller, Hurst, Southlake, Watauga, Colleyville, Saginaw, Richland Hills, Sansom Park, Lake Worth, Eagle Mountain, North Richland Hills, Blue Mound, and Pantego. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35W between mile markers 52 and 67. Interstate 20 between mile markers 445 and 453. Interstate 30 between mile markers 16 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
